titleStmt.title: To the most reverend, the arch-bishops, and bishops, the reverend deans, arch deacons, and the rest of the learned and much honoured convocation now assembled at Westminster ... the humble remonstrance and petition of Lionel Gatford, D.D. and chaplin to His Sacred Majesty, in the behalf of their and his fellow-sufferers, that are ready to starve and perish for want of subsistance.
titleStmt.author: Gatford, Lionel, d. 1665.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
